item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 28, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Israel kills Hizbollah chief Hassan Nasrallah in massive strike on Beirut
2. Trump promises quick end to Ukraine war after meeting Zelenskyy
3. [Opinion] After Nasrallah’s death, the Middle East braces itself
4. Hassan Nasrallah, leader of Hizbollah, 1960-2024
5. Israel says it hit Hizbollah headquarters with Beirut air strike
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 28, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
